Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary Brown "georgiadog"
Reviews.Content: This ended up being a last minute purchase for me on Christmas Day 2009 because I left my camera at home.  And am I glad I did!  (My only regret is that I didn't buy it here on Amazon.)  This camera takes really high-quality pictures, & they are easy to download.  The video capability is also great.  It is super-easy to use.  I even handed it to my 8yr old niece one day so she could use it - all I had to do was show her where the power & shutter buttons were, & off she went with no problem at all.  The fact that it is so small & light-weight is a major plus for me.  I would definitely recomend this to others looking for a good, quality camera that is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Purchase Polaroid 12 meg dig cam Black Friday from Big Lots for Christmas but decided to try it out, and OH boy am I glad I did so that I was able to return it before the return policy for the store was no longer valid.  Returned it and bought GE w1000/1200 from Walgreens and it was 5 dollars cheaper!! not as pretty - but - OH what a difference! With all the same functions, would recommend the GE for the best buy for an over 10 meg dig camera I paid 69.99 for mine. Still in the testing faze. But I am verrrry pleased so far. The video feature is fun. This camera is easy to use and at 12 meg a fabulous buy - only thing I would change (not a big enough problem to avoid purchase)is the small feature pictures - too small for my over 50 eyes.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Youngs "In spirit"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and I love it. It is so easy to download photos to computer with the USB cable that is included. It is really fun to use. This price is great for the quality of the camera. I am still learning the features and experimenting. I would highly recommend this product!!!

Reviews.Title: Thanks Walgreens
Reviews.Author: Terry Callow
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera today at Walgreens in Greenville, Texas. General Electric to me is an off brand in the camera business. I gave it a try and WOW the pictures are awesome and easy to use features are awesome. Just goes to show "You can teach an old dog new tricks"

Reviews.Title: Love My Pic's
Reviews.Author: Violet J
Reviews.Content: This camara is easy to use and takes beautiful pic's. The batteries lasts longer than I expected. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Light weight, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sarah Reich
Reviews.Content: Very light weight and easy to use, picture is higher quality than I expected for a camera priced so cheap. Does not come with a memory card but my old camera's worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: Hmmmm OK
Reviews.Author: M. Stevens "Paradoxicon"
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple to use, and takes ok pictures. It also has a "movie" mode that allows you to make videos(with audio). It requires two "AA" batteries(supplied). The price is ok, but I feel it should be lower.There is no memory card provided, so you have to purchase one separately, otherwise there is only enough internal memory to take ONE picture at full resolution.The resolution rating at 12.2Mp seems high, as the pictures are about the same as my friends (more expensive) 8Megapixel camera, but I admit I have no way to reliably test this aside from just viewing.  Note: I just read in the manual "12MP(4:3), 10MP(3:2), 9MP(16:9)". So it is dependent on viewing mode.There also appears to be a design flaw that drains the batteries. If you leave the camera connected to the computer (via the supplied USB cable) for any length of time, the batteries will go dead in a couple of hours.I don't know if this camera will recharge "rechargeable" batteries or not.The "movie" mode is nice, but the movie resolution is FAR lower than the camera resolution, giving a very grainy clip, and no apparent way of choosing a higher resolution.Bottom line, for another $20 you can get a better camera with a rechargeable battery.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: laura
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday/early Christmas gift for my best friend. Not only was it a great deal ($40, easily worth 3 times that) but she absolutely loves it! The pictures she has taken with it also look like they are taken with a high end professional camera. She's already taken hundreds of photos and so far has no complaints on the camera. I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: good value, thin on documentation
Reviews.Author: Kevin Z. "ClassyGroundcovers.com"
Reviews.Content: Decent camera, good value, a bit non-intuitive and hard to figure out. Recommended for kids and other places where you don't want to feel bad if it gets lost or destroyed.

Reviews.Title: FINE CAMERA - BUT I AM TECHNOLOGICALLY CHALLENGED.
Reviews.Author: Sciolle
Reviews.Content: COBRA MADE IN CHINA HAD A PUSHBUTTOM DIGITAL CAMERA.BY THE TIME I WANTED TO BUY IT IT WAS OUT OF PRODUCTION.I was told this was simple to use.  WRONG !!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little point-and-shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Kristen Rosser
Reviews.Content: Terrific camera, easy to use.  Takes great pictures. Batteries last a long time.  Lots of modes for different kinds of pictures.  Transferring pics to computer is very fast and simple.

Reviews.Title: Upgrade to 2012
Reviews.Author: cwet
Reviews.Content: Most people use Smartphones for photos. I like a discrete camera and this one takes a great photo, is fast, and easy to use. It has a large menu if you like options as well as the auto settings. I haven't checked battery life but my expectations are low on any digital camera. Buy a card.

Reviews.Title: IT IS A GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: David Morales
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA I BOUGHT WAS JUST PERFECT AND THE PRICE TOO, THE PICTURE QUALITY IS VERY GOOD, I WOULD BUY IT AGAUN!

Reviews.Title: not user friendly
Reviews.Author: Earl
Reviews.Content: The camera was not as user friendly as advertised.  We do not like to use it.  Get ready to take picture and your not sure what it is trying to do.

ProductInfo.Features:
24 MB Internal Memory
3X Optical Zoom
SD / SDHC Card Slot
12 Shooting Modes
ProductInfo.Name: GE 12MP Digital Camera
